Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers enter this contest as the underdogs.
The Lakers weren't good enough with either rotation in their 111-97 loss to the Warriors on Tuesday.
The Suns are coming off an impressive 118-114 win over the Nuggets despite playing their bench and reserves only with Kevin Durant, Bradley Beal, Devin Booker and other starters resting/injured.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers will be without James (rest) and Rui Hachimura (calf).
Phoenix shot lights out from 3-point range, going 23 of 52.
The bookmakers marginally favor the Suns to come out on top in their preseason finale against the Lakers.
Others: LeBron James underperformed, tallying six points on 3 of 9 shots.
Anthony Davis was the only bright spot after putting up 24 points and 12 rebounds on 10 of 14 shots.
